post.author: 이진경
post.content:
Senior Level Programmer


  Are you an agile problem solver and pride yourself in having senior level programming skills in Professional Basic and C programming languages?

Do you have extensive Linux experience, preferably with the Caldera distribution, combined with strong bash scripting and very good understanding of Linux peripherals, drivers and programs setup?

Are you a team player able to work with little or no supervision? Working knowledge of financial and accounting business procedures would be a definite asset.

If you have these skills and are not afraid of hard work as long as you can experience high personal satisfaction from the results, Vigilant Business Software has a place for you. We have a strong and talented team of developers that focus on writing business software for multiple location enterprises.

Be Vigilant! To realize this dream, email your resume to hrlinux@vigilant.com

Additional Information
Position Type: Full Time, Employee  

Contact Information
hrlinux@vigilant.com
Vigilant Business Software
post.title: Senior Level Programmer
